description:
This program helps me visually see what code does so I can convert it into RUBY Code for my attempt to create an infinite 2D multiplayer game. Please continue to update this SNAP because this is the best free software a newbie can actually understand. Processing 3 helps me learn to make custom visual functions/methods.

UBUNTU 20.10 (user)

Really easy way to get started with Processing. Click and play.
(i installed this on Ultramarine(Fedora 36))
summary: Great and Easy to use Application

description: This is probably one of the most hassle-free IDEs I have ever used. Love the simplicity and ease of use.
